name: CTCL Floating Cart
author: UjW0L

sections.description:
CTCL Floating Cart adds a sleek and convenient floating cart to your CT Commerce Lite eCommerce site. üõçÔ∏è With this block, customers can peek into their cart anytime, improving their shopping experience by keeping their cart visible and accessible. Perfect for boosting engagement and reducing cart abandonment!

Key Features:
– üõí Floating Cart Block: Easily view the cart contents from any page.
– üîß Easy Integration: Seamlessly integrates with the CT Commerce Lite plugin.
– üé® Customizable Position: Place the floating cart block in your navigation or other desired areas.

Additional Information

For any issues or feature requests, please contact UjW0L.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ctcl-floating-cart directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Which eCommerce plugin is it compatible with?

It is compatible with CT Commerce Lite eCommerce plugin version 2.0.2 and later. üõí

Where can it be used?

The floating cart block can be added wherever blocks are supported. It is ideally placed in the navigation section for easy access. üß≠
